mysteries.name: The Agony in the Garden
mysteries.description: Jesus prays in Gethsemane, accepting the Fatherâ€™s will.

mysteries.name: The Scourging at the Pillar
mysteries.description: Jesus is whipped before His crucifixion.

mysteries.name: The Crowning with Thorns
mysteries.description: Jesus is mocked with a crown of thorns.

mysteries.name: The Carrying of the Cross
mysteries.description: Jesus carries His cross to Calvary.

mysteries.name: The Crucifixion
mysteries.description: Jesus dies on the cross for the salvation of humanity.
